thread.section_title: There’s an abnormally large amount of perverts in Swindon – Metro
thread.title: There’s an abnormally large amount of perverts in Swindon
thread.title_full: There’s an abnormally large amount of perverts in Swindon

author: Nicole Morley
title: There’s an abnormally large amount of perverts in Swindon

organizations.name: swindon camden hackney blackpool westminster norwich oxford cambridge milton keynes

text:
Swindonis the pervert capital of the UK (Picture: David Goddard/Getty) Swindon has been labelled the pervert capital of the UK. 
The town, in Wiltshire, south west England, has an abnormally high number of flashers and peeping Toms.
Workmen crush tiger to death with JCB after it killed two people According to new Home Office figures, there were 94 cases of people exposing themselves or spying on others in the 12 months up to September 2016.
The figure has increased from 40 instances of flashing and voyeurism, which can carry a custodial sentence if suspects are convicted, recorded in the same Swindon area over the same period the year before.
The statistics mean that, when taking an average, one in 2,310 people in Swindon will exhibit some type of pervy antics.
This works out as around three times the national average in the UK.
(Picture: Getty) Following perverted capital of the UK, the London borough of Camden comes in at second place and Hackney in third.
Blackpool and Westminster complete the top of the perverted pops with the fourth and fifth rates of flashers and voyeurs in the country.
Here's the UK's top 10 hot spots for flashing and voyeurism, based on population: Swindon Camden Hackney Blackpool Westminster Norwich Oxford Cambridge Milton Keynes Kingston-upon-Hull Meanwhile, the least affected area in the EK – in terms of voyeurism and flashing – is Rutland in the East Midlands, which didn’t have a single solitary report of the offences in the 12 month period.
